channel.title: Posts on Space Cowboy Coding
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Space Cowboy Coding

item.title: The Joys of Craft
item.description: I get great satisfaction from viewing a product I built using tools I prefer following principles I believe in. On any given day, I work on a number of tech stacks that get the job done but I always end up thinking, "If I could have built this from scratch." Most projects suffer from budget & time constraints and end up being 'good enough', which is OK. But when you do have enough time, when you are able to pick and choose your tools and set them up just right and you watch them work together, then the endorphin's flow.

item.title: We're Live!
item.description: To say that this has been a long time coming would be an understatement, but I am very please to be at this point. There has been so much that I have wanted to post that completing the blog redesign & redevelopment has been a priority. But before I jump into topics of interest, I just wanted to list some of the technologies that are driving the blog. Hugo The more I have used Hugo, the more I have grown to love it.
